results.content: Great presentation and good job man :)
ORDS looked difficult, so I took this course. Velchandru went step by step and always demonstrated what he was talking about, so it quickly made sense. Great class!
results.content_html: ORDS looked difficult, so I took this course. Velchandru went step by step and always demonstrated what he was talking about, so it quickly made sense. Great class!

results.content: This course was a great introduction into the Oracle Apex RESTful services. It provided me with the ability to go out and create my own outbound RESTfl application. The only missibg link was how to import data into an Orav=cle using RESTful. But I believe I now have the knowledge to discovery that on my own.
